mapper.sql: ID, GEN_DT, CHECK_TIME, GEN_TYPE, CARD_NO, MER_NO, MER_NAME, TERM_NO, TRAN_DATE, TRAN_TIME, TRAN_TYPE, COREBAT_NO, COREJONL_NO, CORE_RRN, CORETRAN_AMT, ACQBAT_NO, ACQJONL_NO, ACQ_RRN, ACQTRAN_AMT, FEE, CHK_FLAG, STATUS, ADJUST_FLAG, DC_FLAG, STL_FLAG, STL_AMT, ERRBOOK_ID, OPEROR1, OPER_DT1, COMMENTS1, OPEROR2, OPER_DT2, COMMENTS2, COMMENTS, CONSUME_TYPE

select
example.distinct
from T_CLEAR_CHECK_ERR
order by ${example.orderByClause}

mapper.select: select to_char(sum(coretran_amt), 'fm999999999999990.90') || '#' || to_char(sum(fee), 'fm999999999999990.90') || '#' || to_char(sum(acqtran_amt), 'fm999999999999990.90') as fee from t_clear_check_err
